messages.message:
Hi Team, we have asked repeatedly to turn down your sandboxes once you are not using them.  We have repeatedly seen instances of sandboxes being turned up but not turned down.  Starting next week (Wednesday), we are going to *strictly* enforce force turndown of all sandboxes every 4 hours.

Managers and Leads, please make sure that this is properly communicated to your teams.  (Policy (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cBZkqmCAFtXOaQ_jGx9EyKxwWGliuoHVEcctD1ODfk4/edit))  If you need exceptions for running additional sandboxes, please post it in <#C01N7DV1137|> channel with a reason, and we’ll make sure to address it ASAP.

Here are the sadboxes that I hibernated today:
• asyncreader
• lenny8
• loadtest
• pdfsvc-solutiontests
• peter-bundles
• techinfra
• us-pre-test
Here were the sandboxes that were deleted because they were running out of policy:
• danielgu
• loadtest-tony
• testsandbox
• youngcho-01
cc @Anant
